title: Development of Real-Time Engagement Strategies for Synchronous Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental science concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: A blended science class environment utilizing real-time video conferencing platforms (Zoom) and interactive learning tools (Desmos)

learning_goals: Students can apply strategies such as real-time Q&A and digital collaboration tools to achieve over 80% participation rates in synchronous online classes
Learners form a social presence by providing peer feedback at least three times on online discussion boards
Students engage in cognitive problem-solving activities for scientific issues at least twice weekly using digital tools such as Desmos
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
